content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Unregistering from Apex Central Procedure Go to Administration → Managed Servers → Server Registration. Click Cloud Service Settings. Click Stop managing services with Apex Central. In the dialog box that appears, click Yes. The Cloud Email Gateway Protection server disappears from the server list. © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
